AboutContent: I am a Computer Science student looking for a passionate team to work with.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already sleeping, off to a hike, or studying for an exam
I am passionate about Machine Learning and it's applications.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to explore and work together whenever I can.
